sellerCard.description:
I am a seasoned web developer with 6+ years of expertise. My primary focus is on WordPress and PHP, complemented by skills in React JS, NodeJS, Server & Domain Configuration, and AWS. Specializing in full-site development, custom features, and bug fixes, I ensure excellence in every project.

Let's bring your vision to life!

description.content:
Need a standout WordPress website tailored to your needs? With 6+ years of experience, I deliver top-quality, fully functional sites using Elementor and WooCommerce, ensuring a perfect blend of design and performance.

What I Offer:

  • WordPress Development: Build with your theme or a recommended one, tailored to your vision.
  • Elementor Design: Create stunning, responsive layouts with Elementor for a seamless user experience.
  • WooCommerce Setup: Integrate and customize WooCommerce for a robust eCommerce solution.
  • Plugin Installation: Add and configure essential plugins to enhance functionality.
  • Content Integration: Incorporate your content, optimized for the web.
  • Tailored Customization: Adjust design and features to meet your specific needs.

Key Features:

  • Responsive Design: Ensures a smooth experience on all devices.
  • SEO-Optimized: Implemented with best practices for better search engine visibility.
  • Enhanced Security: Robust measures to protect your site from threats.
  • Fast Load Times: Optimized for speed and performance.
  • Elegant Layouts: Modern, custom-designed aesthetics that captivate users.
  • Conversion-Focused: Features that drive engagement & conversions with intuitive navigation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why is it compulsory to contact first before ordering?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Because we can discuss the availability, cost, and delivery time of a project and other feasibilities. Every job is different and needs a specific amount of time, dedication, and commitment so, kindly contact me before ordering.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The most basic and compulsory requirements are: 1. WordPress friendly hosting or Linux cPanel based hosting. 2. A domain name/website name (e.g. www.example.com) linked with hosting server. 3. Content for pages (text+images).

questionsAndAnswers.question: I like some websites very much , can you create something similar?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Well, I can answer this question after checking the website. You are highly welcome to share your ideas and thought in the inbox, thank you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide premium theme licenses or plug-ins licenses that are used for the development of my websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. If you need support or updates for premium themes/plugins, which I have used for your website from theme/plugin developer, you will need to purchase that theme/plugin. My package does not include licenses.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I manage my website myself easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can manage your website from easy to use admin panel and can update your website as you want with simple drag and drop options.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am confuse or not sure which package suit for my project.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No problem. Just drop me a message, I will get back to you as ASAP. I will guide you through whole process.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I don't have any content (text + images) ready for my website or pages?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: First of all, I am not a content writer. However, if you do not have content ready for your website pages or blog, no problem! I will add dummy text, images, and placeholders so that you can update your website's content easily in the future.

packageList.title: Lite
packageList.description: 1 Page Wordpress Responsive Site, Theme Installation, Page Creation & Customization.

packageList.title: Plus
packageList.description: 5 Page Wordpress Responsive Site, Theme Installation, Page Creation & Customization + Content

packageList.title: Pro
packageList.description: WordPress Responsive Website with Up to 10 pages, Theme Installation, Page Creation & Customization.

reviews.comment: As always very fast to fix things for me.

I love this man! he has helped me with many projects. 
I wish I would hire him full time. He is kind of a wizard of Oz with coding and skills.

Made edits and revisions to website. Improved the over all flow of website. Relieved anxiety and renewed confidence in my brand! Also, order was delivered in a very timely manner. Would definitely hire again! Thank you so much Ali Luqman!
